summary: A routine military exercise turns into a nightmare in the Scotland wilderness.
cast: Sean Pertwee|Kevin McKidd|Emma Cleasby|Liam Cunningham|Thomas Lockyer|Darren Morfitt|Chris Robson|Leslie Simpson|Tina Landini|Craig Conway|Villrikke's Acer|Bryn Walters|Ben Wright|Brian Claxton Payne
title: Dog Soldiers
